title: What are the best songs to sing in a YG Global audition? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just choose any song you're comfortable with. If you're singing but you can't hit high notes well, don't choose a high pitched song. Just choose a song that fits your voice. If you're dancing but your dancing style is more on fluidity and balance rather than sharpness and power, then choose a choreography that would fit your style the best. Either way goodluck on your audition!^^

Definitely audition with a hip-hop or RnB music. YG is all about hip hop and RnB (I think I spelled that right?). I don’t recommend to sing a cute song cus that’s not what YG is about. Don’t go to a hip hop company singing Twice 😅 Hope this helped you 😁!
